page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: Mark Hanks lives with his{family}in Hook Road, Ampfield. He has one sister, Claire who is in the Nursery at Sherborne House School. His mother does not work, but his father is at I.B.M. in Hursley. Mark wakes up at 7.30 am. and goes down for breakfast. He usually eats All-Bran and then gets dressed. His mother takes him to school most mornings in the car with his sister. On a typical Wednesday Mathematics is his first{lesson,}followed by Reading and Writing.After Break he has Physical Education followed by Project work.After lunch he has Reading or Writing, then Nature Study and finally a story.After leaving school at 3.30 pm.he plays on his bicycle and at 5.10 pm.,when his father comes home he has supper.When he goes to bed his father reads to him for half an hour.
